titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Multiple Sclerosis Awareness Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
1/8/2009--Introduced.
Expresses support for the goals and ideals of Multiple Sclerosis Awareness Week. Reaffirms the nation's commitment to combating multiple sclerosis.
Recognizes people living with multiple sclerosis and salutes the health care professionals and medical researchers who assist those afflicted and continue to work to find cures and improve treatments.
